channel.title: Run RS Client on different website
channel.description: How do i run the client on my website so that it doesn't goto the error page

item.title: Run RS Client on different website
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

you’ll need to edit the client to do that,

the applet checks at which web page its embedded by calling getDocumentBase(), and all web browsers give the “correct” url, so i guess the best way is to edit the client, and even when it gets that url, it doesn’t care.

Read full topic
item.source: Run RS Client on different website
